name: MD Ziauddin
headline: Senior Software Engineer | Technical Lead: AI, Cloud (AWS/GCP), Fintech - System Architecture - GenAI - Team Mentor
about:
Senior Software Engineer (5+ yrs, B.Tech IT). Technical Lead skilled in system architecture, scalable AI, and full-stack product delivery (React, Node.js, AWS/GCP).

- Led architecture for AI/Fintech products; slashed response latency 90%, sped releases 40%.

- Designed/mentored agile teams (4+ engineers); collaborative delivery with global business and product heads.

- Hands-on builder and code reviewer; expert in real-time data, cloud native, Google Apps Script, Gen AI.

Open to senior/lead roles: Tech Lead - Staff Engineer - Principal Developer (onsite/hybrid/remote, India & global).

Let's build impact-driven products!

description: Architected AI/Fintech platform transformation, driving 90% latency reduction and 40% faster releases. Led cross-functional strategy with business/product heads for scalable system design.
Spearheaded real-time WebSocket streaming architecture, transforming static UX into dynamic conversational AI assistant (React, Node.js, AWS/GCP)
Pioneered reusable react-gas framework adopted company-wide; enhanced developer velocity and code quality standards
Owned end-to-end system design for AI Assistant and scalable referral engine; drove technical reviews and architecture decisions
Mentored 4+ junior engineers, fostering ownership culture and engineering craftsmanship; improved team autonomy and code quality
As a key engineer in a client-facing role, I translated complex enterprise needs into innovative and tangible software solutions, from initial concept to full-scale deployment.

Spearheaded multiple proof-of-concepts (POCs) using React and Node.js, rapidly translating abstract ideas into functional prototypes that secured stakeholder buy-in and led to green-lighting two major enterprise development projects.

Drove the end-to-end development of critical cloud-native projects on AWS for large-scale enterprise clients, engineering efficient and scalable full-stack solutions that directly contributed to securing repeat business and follow-on contracts.

Engineered robust solutions for complex integration challenges, ensuring seamless data flow and front-end performance that consistently met and exceeded enterprise-level security and reliability standards.
Took ownership of critical front-end initiatives, focusing on modernization, security, and seamless user experience for core VMware products.
Led migration of user authentication system to OAuth 2.0, eliminated legacy vulnerabilities, and improved product security.
Sole UI engineer for company rebranding, rebuilt key UIs with React, improved brand experience product-wide.
Developed complex customer-facing features for licensing/subscription portal, making critical revenue-generating journeys more intuitive.
Delivered key data visualization features using AntV G6 as part of a 50-person team
Implemented Charts and visualization mapping interconnectivity between VMs using AntV G6
Built MERN stack apps; strong understanding of JavaScript and React.
Translated Figma designs into high-quality, reusable React components.
Wrote maintainable, reusable code as a foundation for the application's UI.
Managed 100+ desktops, programmed .bat automations (50% faster setup), designed DB schema with SQL/Python

recommendations.text: At VMware, Zia and I worked together on multiple critical project during his tenure of 1 year. For me and many of us from back-end team, Zia is the go to person for front-end features. Zia's due diligence and efforts to know the E2E use-case for the functionality that he was working on was really impressive. This help us in many cases to deliver performance optimized front-end and back-end integration. He is really passionate about his work which enabled us to deliver the mission critical project in time with quality.
